title: WIRING
fullText:
Wiring shall be tested for insulation, continuity, polarity, short circuits and phase rotation (for three phase systems).
Test and commission all equipment in accordance with manufacturers' instructions.
PV arrays shall be tested in accordance with AS/NZS 5033.
NOTE: The consumer's mains, switchboards and associated wiring may also require verification (inspection and testing) to AS/NZS 3000 requirements.
